Title: The Bet Collector
Writer: Ralston Jover (story and screenplay), Armando Lao (screenplay supervision)
Actors: Gina PareÃ±o, Fonz Deza, Nanding Josef, Soliman Cruz
Plot: In this starkly realistic narrative, director Jeffrey Jeturian presents a captivating portrait of a once-proud woman, haunted by memories of a dead son and hounded by the police, and her fragile and lonely life as a "kurador".
